akn:section.akn:heading: Tax credits to Qualified Social E-Commerce Companies; exceptions.

akn:content.akn:p: The real property tax abatement for certain commercial properties provided in § 47-811.03.

Earning and allowance of wage tax credits against the tax imposed by § 47-1817.06, as provided in § 47-1817.03, during calendar years 2010 through 2015, unless the amount of such credits earned exceeds $15 million, in which case the credit amount in excess of $15 million may be allowed as a credit against the tax imposed by § 47-1817.06, as provided in § 47-1817.03.
The waiver of corporate income tax on a Qualified High Technology Company for 5 years from the date of commencing business as provided in § 47-1817.06(a)(2)(C).
